QueryResult.text: SELECT OS.PRINCIPAL_ID USER_ID, AP.OBJECT_ID, PE.PERMISSION_CODE, PE.PERMISSION_VALUE, AP.ID ID, OS.ID OS_ID, PE.ID PE_ID FROM CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS PE, CMN_SEC_ASSGND_OBJ_PERM AP, CMN_SEC_ASSGND_RIGHT OS, CMN_SEC_GROUPS G WHERE OS.INSTANCE_TYPE = 'SYSTEM' AND OS.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'USER' AND OS.RIGHT_ID = AP.PRINCIPAL_ID AND AP.IS_RIGHT_DEFINITION = 1 AND AP.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'GROUP' AND AP.PERMISSION_ID = PE.PERMISSION_ID AND AP.PRINCIPAL_ID = G.ID AND G.IS_ACTIVE = 1
